title: Head of Delivery - Gaming
description: When I was joining Yggdrasil, it was a small, rapidly growing start-up. As Head of Delivery, I was responsible for development and delivery of games for online casinos. During the first year, we have doubled the number of people within Gaming Department and built several teams in different geographical locations. The biggest challenges that I had been focusing on were scaling the structure up, maintaining the start-up culture of the company and ensuring that ambitious business needs can be addressed by software development teams.

details.title: See key responsibilities
items: Setting and communicating the vision, mission and targets for Gaming Department
Creating right environment and working culture of entire department
Preparing project roadmaps for the department and making sure that there is enough capacity to deliver them
Negotiate scope and manage trade-offs for delivery decisions
Ultimate responsibility for delivery agreed roadmaps (project tracking and planning)
Ultimate responsibility for the performance of the department
